segments.text: So Alex , you ’ re off to the Olympic stadium then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I should get there just in time for the women ’ s 400m relay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that should be really exciting , especially with so many famous athletes there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ m also going to watch the triple jump and the high jump .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well have a good time . Get me some autographs if you can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I ’ ll try my best .
segments.speaker: S2
